sub_title: Senior SAP Development Consultant at Quinso
summary:
I am an experienced ABAP developer and am very much appreciated by my colleagues and clients for my technical skills, knowledge, open way of communicating, analytical skills and an eye for detail.
I am customer-oriented and focused on delivering quality.
I have over 15 years of experience in working with SAP solutions and I am an SAP Certified Development Associate - ABAP with SAP NetWeaver 7.02. 
In these years I gained a lot of knowledge in the following areas:
- SAP ABAP on HANA
- ABAP Workbench 
- ABAP OO
- ABAP Proxy
- ALV List Programming
- SAP Enhancement Framework
- Smartforms

projects.title: Several Projects and Support Customers
projects.description:
Role: Senior SAP Development Consultant
Working on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Developments. In-App extensibility, Adobe Forms, Gateway services.
Extensive knowledge of the ABAP Development workbench in SAP ERP systems and S/4HANA On-Premise.

profile_positions.description:
Quinso, Quality in Solutions

"When thinking of supply chain, you think of Quinso." With these words we received the SAP Partner award for Digital Supply Chain Partner of the year 2020. 

At Quinso we offer intelligent SAP solutions for every part of the supply chain and oversee the entire process. From raw material to end product and from warehouse to end customer. As part of the ORBIS Group, we have a strong international position. 

We help organizations to get the most out of their supply chain processes. Step by step, according to our proven methodology, at the pace of the customer, without disrupting their current supply chain. Digitizing the supply chain has many advantages. Organizations that have taken the step towards a "Digital Supply Chain" are able to identify and solve problems at an early stage. With intelligent SAP solutions, Cloud and On Premise, and an expert consultancy team, we deliver a successful implementation. 

Organizations such as Fujifilm, Supertape, Leaseweb, Grolsch, Friesland Campina, Avebe, Stahl, AEG Power Solutions and IGM Resins have already experienced this. 

What drives Quinso?
At Quinso we always want to excel in our work. By implementing the best solutions at  our customers they can take full advantage of all the possibilities a 'digital supply chain' has to offer and really make a difference.
 
Interested in finding out more about the biggest advantages of a digital supply chain? 
Visit www.quinso.com or contact us at info@quinso.com or +31 (0) 73 206 22 00.
profile_positions.title: Senior SAP Development Consultant

profile_positions.description:
SAP NetWeaver Consultant (09-2008 - 12-2009) 
Senior SAP NetWeaver Consultant (01-2010 - 02-2018)
- 7 years experience at Philips Lighting in various projects.
First line support for questions and advice about developments on the Lighting SAP systems R/3 and APO and Team Lead for the on-site development QA team.
Used SAP Development Tools: Function Modules, SAP Script, Data dictionary, Classic Dynpro, ABAP OO, SAP Enhancement Framework, SALV Classes, SmartForms, Sproxy and Webservices. 
Used Modules: SD, MM, PP, FI, CO, WM, SCM, APO, CRM.

- 1,5 years experience in SAP IS-Utilities at Dong Energy, Attero and Alliander.
Used tools: EFRM, ABAP, ABAP OO, Sproxy, FQ Events, SAP Workflow.

- 0,5 years experience in SAP HR system at Vebego.
Used tools: Sproxy, ABAP, ABAP OO.
